name: Sneaky Peeky
description:
Time for being stealthy! Dive into the shadows of Sneaky Peeky and experience real multiplayer stealth action. Use the environment to conceal your presence and avoid getting caught. Find ways to disrupt enemy team. Work together with your teammates to achieve victory. Discuss your strategy and be sneaky!

Gather friends or play with other people online and complete tasks for your selected team. As a thief you must steal as much treasure as possible quickly and without being noticed. On the other hand, as a guard your task is to reveal and catch these malicious thieves.

Both sides can select from variety of different gadgets to help them on their mission. Explore procedurally generated maps and find ways to trick your opponents. Use vents, gadgets, throwables and more to fulfil your goals!

Features:

  • Online multiplayer
  • Built in voice chat
  • Dynamic shadows
  • Procedurally generated maps
  • 65+ different skins
  • 8+ gadgets to choose from
